adjectives.description: tapped (comparative more tapped, superlative most tapped)

examples: a tapped keg; a tapped maple tree

entries.meaning: (card games, board games) Of a card or playing piece: used up for the current turn.

examples: This is one weird tribe, who get their kicks from electrocution, poisoning and causing car crashes (and that's when they're in a good mood!). They consider a holiday in the Bermuda Triangle the ultimate and anyone who keeps floating hands as pets has to be a bit tapped.

entries.meaning: simple past tense and past participle of tap
